item.title: Despite XRP Lawsuit Win, Why is XRP Price Not Reaching $1?
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Soon after the Ripple court ruling last month in mid-July, the XRP price gained nearly 100% in a week’s time reaching the 2023-high of $0.85. However, it has entered into major retracement with XRP now trading at $0.64 and a market cap of $33 billion. It seems that the excitement of Ripple’s win over the

The post Despite XRP Lawsuit Win, Why is XRP Price Not Reaching $1? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Shiba Inu Lead Developer Hints At Imminent Shibarium Mainnet Release
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu lead developer Shytoshi Kusama earlier confirmed a high possibility of Layer-2 Shibarium mainnet launch during the Blockchain Futurist Conference in Toronto, Canada in mid-August. item.title: Bitcoin Miner Marathon Sees Revenue Jump in Q2, Losses Narrow
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
On Tuesday, August 8, Bitcoin mining giant Marathon Digital Holdings Ltd. (NASDAQ: MARA) reported its second-quarter earnings for the year 2023. The Bitcoin miner reported a surge in revenue with losses narrowing. Amid the surge in the Bitcoin price this year, Marathon Digital has increased sales of BTC, thereby profiting from the upward momentum. Headquartered

The post Bitcoin Miner Marathon Sees Revenue Jump in Q2, Losses Narrow appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Stability, Volatility And Potential Rebound
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Bitcoin price stands out for holding firmly in a narrow range between $29,000 and $30,000 for several weeks. This consolidation cuts across the crypto market, with experts calling for regulatory clarity in the United States, expected to catalyze the move above $30,000. item.title: Shiba Inu News: Shibarium Validators Goes Live On Mainnet After PuppyNet Stops
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu News: Lead developer Shytoshi Kusama has confirmed the Shibarium mainnet release at the Blockchain Futurist Conference and ETH hackathons in Canada next week. Meanwhile, the Shibarium testnet “PuppyNet” on halt for nearly 3 days and Shibarium validators going live on the mainnet raise speculation of an imminent launch next week. Shiba Inu Layer-2

The post Shiba Inu News: Shibarium Validators Goes Live On Mainnet After PuppyNet Stops appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: US DoJ Confirms Plans for Original 7-Count Charge Levied on SBF

item.description:

item.title: Just In: Binance is Now Fully Licensed in El Salvador
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Binance, the world’s biggest crypto exchange, has just announced that it has received a fully operational license to serve customers in El Salvador. This milestone comes amid the country’s growing adoption of Bitcoin (BTC) as a legal tender. item.title: Just-In: Huobi And Other Crypto Exchanges Announce PayPal USD (PYUSD) Listing
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Justin Sun’s Huobi crypto exchange and other crypto exchanges have started announcing the listing of Paxos-issued PayPal USD (PYUSD) stablecoin within just 24 hours of the launch. On Monday, PayPal and Paxos unveiled PayPal USD (PYUSD) stablecoin, which is backed by highly liquid and secure assets. The crypto community gives mixed reactions to the stablecoin.

The post Just-In: Huobi And Other Crypto Exchanges Announce PayPal USD (PYUSD) Listing appeared first on CoinGape.

item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
